channel.title: Search any site for files e.g. rapid share
channel.description: ok, so if you wanted to search rapid share for a file you would type"yourfilenamehere.*site:rapidshare.de" or megaupload "yourfilename.*site:megaupload.com" in google. FAQ: why do I need to put the "*" answer:because that will search for anything. e.g exe .rar all file extractions.

ok, so if you wanted to search rapid share for a file you would type"yourfilenamehere.*site:rapidshare.de"
or megaupload “yourfilename.site:megaupload.com" in google.

why do I need to put the "” answer:because that will search for anything. e.g exe .rar all file extractions.
